answers.answer: If there are no other changes in his behavior, and all else is normal, it may be related to age.  If your budgie has gained a lot of weight recently and is now overweight I would suspect an endocrine disorder.If he is passing more waste than usual, it could be kidney disease or diabetes.Budgie's can suffer from many of the same illnesses that effect other pets.  If possible it might be best to have him examined by a vet.

question: My budgie used to take 1 to 2 naps a day...lately he has been napping about 8-10 naps a day...Is he sick??  He is about 8 years old... is there anything i could do for him?
title: my budgie
